settings.help_text: Request an API key at [https://developers.gfycat.com/signup/#](!https://developers.gfycat.com/signup/#). Enter the client ID you receive via email to this field. When blank, uses the default API key provided by Gfycat.
The API secret generated by Gfycat for your API key. When blank, uses the default API secret provided by Gfycat.
